content.text:
# Republican Building (Jinan)

Republican Building in July 2009
The Republican Building (|p=Gònghé Lóu}}) is a historical landmark building and a hospital from the early 20th century located at the Shandong University campus, in the city of Jinan, Shandong Province, China. The building was originally part of the hospital of Cheeloo University. Construction of the building was sponsored by the British Baptist Church. Work began in 1914 and was completed the following year. The building was officially inaugurated on September 27, 1915, by the military governor of Shandong, Jin Yunpeng (|t=|p=Jìn Yúnpéng}}).
